name: Echoes of Aviann
description:
:
Hello everyone! I've had this premise for a game floating around in my head for a while now. I figured since I wanted to work with sound for the maze portion, a jam with the theme "echoes" would be perfect for testing it out! So, would you guys like to see this completed? I have no idea if or when I would, but knowing people are interested always gets me more excited to work on a long term project! 

Bitsy Hacks Used:
Bitsymuse
Transparent Sprites
Image to Bitsy by ruin
